definition: an estimate based on little or no information, to expect, believe, or suppose
details:
noun
- an estimate based on little or no information
= example: an estimate based on little or no information
= synonyms: dead reckoning
- a message expressing an opinion based on incomplete evidence
= example: a message expressing an opinion based on incomplete evidence
= synonyms: supposition
verb
- to expect, believe, or suppose
= example: to expect, believe, or suppose
= synonyms: think
- to guess correctly
= example: to guess correctly
= synonyms: infer
- to judge tentatively or form an estimate of
= example: to judge tentatively or form an estimate of
= synonyms: estimate
- to put forward a guess in spite of possible refutation
= example: to put forward a guess in spite of possible refutation
= synonyms: venture
